attributes.action: All internet providers must give out ppp username and passwords
attributes.additional_details: Sky costumers are force to use there routers but yet you don't get the full service though there router that you pay for
attributes.background: Some internet providers make you use there equipment but as a consumer we should be able to use are own equipment as we please

rejection.details: This petition seems to be calling on internet service providers, not the Government or Parliament to take action. Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.
